sentence: Her children arise up, and call her blessed; her husband also, and he praiseth her.
string: Her children arise up, and call her blessed; her husband also, and he praiseth her.

sentence: Many daughters have done virtuously, but thou excellest them all.
string: Many daughters have done virtuously, but thou excellest them all.

sentence: Favour is deceitful, and beauty is vain: but a woman that feareth the LORD, she shall be praised.
string: Favour is deceitful, and beauty is vain: but a woman that feareth the LORD, she shall be praised.

sentence: Give her of the fruit of her hands; and let her own works praise her in the gates.
string: Give her of the fruit of her hands; and let her own works praise her in the gates.
